summary: All Round 1 fixes verified. Q1 env var expansion works correctly, Q2 logging already existed, Q3 model validation now consistent, Q4 sys.path.insert added to ralph scripts. No new issues introduced.
functional_test_reason: Fixes are config/import changes only, don't affect LLM output. Original R1 functional test requirement still applies to overall PR.

fixes_verified.verification: Config now uses ${REPOS_PATH} syntax, evaluate_results_v2.py lines 41-52 properly expand env var with clear error messages
Logging was already comprehensive - warns on 0 files, logs diagnostics, detects format errors
Now validates 'models' key and 'models.judge' with clear error messages before creating VALID_MODELS
Added sys.path.insert(0, str(Path(__file__).parent)) with explanatory comment

deferred_items.reason: Two evaluators with different auth is acceptable - v2 is primary, v1 exists for legacy
Emoji in voice hook is intentional UI/UX choice
Gestalt as info-only metric is intentional design
KNOWN_REPOS divergence is cosmetic for scoring bonus, not hard validation
